post.body: Wasn't implying otherwise on the low budget thing - just that didn't seem to fit CH's priorities. I guess that's business :)
Not the entrepreneurs, nor, perhaps in this case, the audience. More risky than HP - older actors, less built in timeframe.
There are risks involved, but the fact is that the movies need to be made, and in a timely fashion. Vision is for the artists.
It entered my mind as well. HP benefited from the moving fwd. What's done is done, but financiers learn.
Abstinence = short term financial opportunity. The transition is tricky, and moreso post Britney.
Perhaps the financials are over-riding the vision of book to screen. As CH's release suggests. Understandable.....
Nor did 13 have sparkles.Unless you count sparkles under the influence. Which I don't. Twilight abstinence must be in all areas.
Yes, well, I'd have to have watched Twilight to know ! However, anticipating stylistic = not the hospital scene.
Oh dear: http://tinyurl.com/5gq6yp . Tell me though, how did CH go from Thirteen to sparkles.
Yes, well, European vampires have an inbuilt skepticism of sparkles. Sparkles are more of a new world thing.
Speaking of wordpress : http://tinyurl.com/5w77j9 (maybe not 2.7 though)
When you earn out on CUTB, invest in European real-estate. We'll have dinner in an all dark restaurant. No sparkles allowed !
You know, I'm sure there are real estate bargains in Translyvania. I hear Romania is lovely this time of year.
It frightens me the whole six degrees things. You need only know an actor (or guest blogger, this being web2.0+, and bam !)
Just curious - myself doing 8 night shifts a month (including last night) for years, I know the delicate balance that exists.
Question : Have you slept since your brain fog / cleansing nap of 21hrs ago ?
And New York mags approval matrix has it at brilliant but slightly lowbrow. I think HBO must have a lock on the highbrow vamps.
I've not seen it myself, but I have to think that the europeans are very educated in the ways of vampires :)
but have you seen the swedish romantic vampire movie "let the right one in"?
You know, I do wonder,if they're going to take drugs,why don't they go for the performance enhancing ones. Is that too much to ask?
No, I think alea has the review trend back on the right track. btw, http://tinyurl.com/5skq3t - CUTB can be bought $AU.
Hope the dessert buffet lived up to its promise as well ! & I think drunk after the fact is more than acceptable.Kudos to surviving!
I've always thought the iceberg put in a great performance. A pivotal role really :)
Though, if I had been standing there with Kate, and Celine was singing, I might actually get it. After which I would drown. Hmm.
I think you're confusing Celine with Kate. Or is it I who is confused ? If so, I shall not apologise :)
You don't have to internet sing them. Just release a CD :)
From my understanding, Celine makes more sense with elevated levels of oxytocin and vasopressin. Consequently, I don't get it :)
I was only going off the lyrics; haven't heard the song itself (nor want to).
Unfortunately, a lot of women (& men) feel they deserve no better than 'someday'. And that can, and will, be exploited.
Not unless you plan to make it a picture book, I guess. You could perhaps go with "Some Girls Are (Wild)"
good luck with the musical mastery - the witching hour is about to send me into horizontal slumber, plus my candles are out !
You have to know that I like that you are going to be doing that :) I promise to take closer to 7 than to 24 hours though !
I have a feeling you're going to be luckier than that. I have theories, but will let them unfold via the text. As the should :)
I think the use of CAPS are a good start. & reassuring to know that feedback suggests surprise plot dev for many. This is good !
After Dec 23 I may have to isolate myself more, cause I really don't want to know !!! Yet :)
I will look forward to finding out in January. I've been impressed your reviewers so far have been deft in not saying.
In my line of work, hate or animosity rarely makes for a good outcome. I could see enough in Parker to work with :)
But then, you know that better than me :) Mind you, in two chapters I felt protective towards Parker. Different perspective.
It must be serious if you are pulling an all-dayer. Meanwhile, I am on my last night shift and doing internet research.
I'm sure we can sell Parker as a self-help guru, though perhaps only in a relatively small niche demographic market. But still !
Well, self-help books cash in on xmas gift cards with releases over the next couple weeks, so that's one possible angle.
Due to the tyranny of distance, delivery here will be mid-January. I'm more at the mercy of the postal services than anything else.
That bodes well for a pre xmas delivery. No shipping on mine as yet, not that it matters much really, but good to know :)
Have you read the full article ? If not, and you want to read it, I could probably source it for you.
The things I do to be able to afford to buy books by important people !
To be fair, 3 in 5 is better than humans. And, Edward probably just wants to practice safe biting. But Bella is right to wait.
And already in the news again for non football stuff ! Should be an interesting year.
And I hope you didn't feel the need to respond with actual words, but rather a knowing glance.
“The way you make a movie like this, it turns out, is you get Kate, Leo and Sam.” http://tinyurl.com/6qhegx Well, yes, that would do it.
Experimenting with photo galleries on mobile me : http://gallery.me.com/damon.ford if interested. Sunday afternoon, and whatnot.
